OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD MOTOR NEURONE DISORDERS RESEARCH ADVISORY GROUP

Desc.entry: A voluntary committee that has been set up to bring together patients, carers and lay members (with an interest in Motor Neurone Disease research) from the Sheffield area who wish to be actively involved in ensuring patient and public involvement in Sheffield MND research. The group meets up to 4 times a year with contact throughout the year to review new projects and ideas. The group intends to enable patients and carers perspectives' to be included in research proposals; provide knowledge from each member's experiences with MND; identify and prioritise research topics from the patients' prospective; improve recruitment to research studies; help identify improved treatments from research results; give patients and carers a more authoritative voice; help build public credibility and trust in clinical research; improve the input from patients and carers to research projects; identify possible barriers to patients effective involvement in research; help write lay summaries for research proposals. New members welcome.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Quarterly meetings, please contact for details
